1.name: Modern Craft Tailors
1.about: Modern Craft Tailors provides a variety of services pertaining to the creation and modification of apparel. Their areas of expertise include collecting exact measurements, designing clothes based on personal tastes, and making personalised clothing. Furthermore, Modern Craft Tailors offers alterations, making adjustments to ready-made garments to guarantee a perfect fit. This may include altering the general structure of a garment, taking in or letting out seams, and shortening or extending hems. Modern Craft Tailors could also provide repairs, such mending rips or changing buttons, to extend the life of apparel. All things considered, they are vital in improving the fit, comfort, and style of the clothes that they provide to their customers. They have been constantly providing various services related to tailoring. They ensure to provide only the best services to their customers. This has helped them earn a rating of 4.8.
1.address: L 2/640, Vineet Khand, Gomti Nagar, Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh 226010

2.name: New Sk Tailors
2.about: While the current shopping experience is dominated by the availability of readymade garments in different sizes, nothing beats the personal touch and craftsmanship of having your clothes stitched from scratch. And the professionals who can help you stitch your clothes are often called tailors. 'Tailors' are expert craftspeople with a focus on making and customising garments for each client. They design and create outfits including suits, skirts, and shirts using materials, sewing machines, and hand tools. Customising garments to fit the individual tastes and body types of their clients is something that tailors are renowned for, as is their accuracy in obtaining measurements. Tailors ensure that clothing fits properly and looks fashionable, which is important in the fashion business. They can create custom outfits or adjust ready-made clothes. If you are looking for a skilled or professional.
2.address: 3/6-7, Vikaskhand 3, Gwari Village, Vikas Khand, Gomti Nagar, Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh 226010

5.name: GD Tailors
5.about: Welcome to GD Tailor, where we're all about making clothes just right for you. Here's what we do: Custom-Made Clothes: We create clothes that match your style and size perfectly. Precise Measurements: We take careful measurements to ensure your clothes fit like a dream. Design Your Way: Tell us what you like, and we'll design clothes tailored to your taste. Fix and Fit: Got a favorite piece that needs tweaking? We'll alter it to fit you perfectly. Mend and Extend: Rips, tears, or missing buttons? We'll fix them up to keep your clothes going strong. At Gd Tailor, we're all about making sure your clothes look good, feel great, and last a long time.
